meaningMnemonic: There is a line on the <radical>ground</radical> so you <radical>stop</radical>, making a giant sign pop up that says <kanji>CORRECT</kanji>! You obeyed the rules of the road and did the correct thing. Good on you.
readingMnemonic: You did the <kanji>correct</kanji> thing, so here's your reward: a <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい) from the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) himself!
